00025 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Interceptor_ParseValues extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractInterceptor {
00026 
00034         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00035                 $this->gp = $gp;
00036 
00037                 //parse as float
00038                 $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",", $settings['parseFloatFields'], true);
00039                 $this->parseFloats($fields);
00040                 
00041                 return $this->gp;
00042         }
00043         
00050         protected function parseFloats($fields){
00051                 if (is_array($fields)) {
00052                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00053                                 if(isset($this->gp[$field])) {
00054                                         $this->gp[$field] = $this->getFloat($this->gp[$field]);
00055                                 }
00056                         }
00057                 }
00058         }
00059 
00068         protected function getFloat($value) {
00069         return floatval(preg_replace('#^([-]*[0-9\.,\' ]+?)((\.|,){1}([0-9-]{1,2}))*$#e', "str_replace(array('.', ',', \"'\", ' '), '', '\\1') . '.\\4'", $value));
00070         } 
00071 
00072 }
00073 ?>
